subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
This is a late character, and the divergent readings in various topolects may or may not be cognate.

The {{cog|cmn|-}} reading came from {{zh-l|摔|to fling, to throw, to fall down}}, which can be traced to *''srut'' in {{cog|och|-}}. It can be compared with {{cog|bo|རུད||slip, that which has slipped down, falling mass, landslides}}, {{m|bo|རུད་རུད་པོ||loosened, disintegrated, rough}}.

The {{cog|yue|-}} reading is probably unrelated, though it may reflect a descendant of the archaic pronunciation *''rut'' and hence be cognate with Mandarin. Either way, it is evidently from the same source as {{cog|nan|甪|tr=lut||to come off, to slip loose}}, {{cog|za|lot||to come loose and drop off (due to loose tying)}}, and {{cog|vi|lột||to peel, to strip off}}. May be compared with {{cog|bo|ལོད་པོ||relaxed, careless}}, {{m|bo|ལྷོད་པོ||relaxed, loose, lax}}, and the Chinese word family of {{zh-l|*兌}} (*''lot'', > {{zh-l|*脫|to come off}}, {{zh-l|*蛻|exuviae}}). Unlikely to be related to {{zh-l|落|to fall, to drop off}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|Mandarin|Hokkien|Wu}} to [[toss]]; to [[throw]]; to [[fling]]
#: {{zh-x|把 石子 甩 出去|'''throw''' the stone away}}
# {{lb|zh|Mandarin}} to [[throw away]]; to [[discard]]
# {{lb|zh|Mandarin}} to [[brush off]]; to [[abandon]]
#: {{zh-x|他 被 女友 甩 了。|He was '''dumped''' by his girlfriend.}}
# {{lb|zh|Mandarin}} to [[swing]]
#: {{zh-x|甩 尾巴{ba}|to '''wag''' one's tail}}
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin}} to [[take off]]; to [[remove]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin}} to [[heed]]; to take [[notice]] of
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin|of insects|fish|etc.}} to [[lay]] (eggs)
# {{lb|zh|Beijing}} to [[play]] (cards)
# {{lb|zh|Beijing}} {{zh-short|甩賣|to sell at cheap prices}}
# {{lb|zh|Beijing}} to [[scold]]
# {{lb|zh|Sichuan}} [[perturbed]]; [[uneasy]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[come]] [[loose]]; to [[come off]]
#: {{zh-x|佢 條 鞋帶 甩 咗。|His shoelace came untied.|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Wu}} to [[strike]]; to [[box]] (about the ears)
# {{lb|zh|Wu}} to [[shake off]]; to [[escape]]
# {{lb|zh|Wu}} to [[wave]]; to [[rock]]
# {{lb|zh|Hokkien}} to [[sprinkle]]; to [[spray]]
